name: TowerZ: Alpha Test
description:
*Alpha Play Test*

TowerZ Trello Board

Description:

This is a tower defense game where you have workers that gather your primary resources to purchase additional workers, marines, and base turrets. Killing zombies has a chance for a research crate to drop which is used for purchasing new types of turrets, turret upgrades, unit upgrades, and special abilities. 

There are currently 2 maps in the progression to play with more being added soon for the playtest. Please leave feedback for any bugs, ideas for gameplay changes, ideas for polish, or just to comment on the game itself.

Thanks for playing!
